import React from 'react' import TableRow from './TableRow' import { Button, Checkbox, Icon, Table } from 'semantic-ui-react' const TableComponent = (props) => { let renderQueue = () => { return props.userObj.user_queues.map( queue => { return }) } return ( Title Rating Release_date Genres? { renderQueue() }
) } export default TableComponent;
